summary: The role of the Server is to serve food and beverages to our guests in a timely, courteous, efficient and accurate manner. All functions are carried out to...
full_description: The role of the Server is to serve food and beverages to our guests in a timely, courteous, efficient and accurate manner. All functions are carried out to maintain an environment of teamwork.Additional responsibilities include:-Provide excellent service to our guests at all times;-Accurately take guest orders and enter into computer system;-Answer guest questions regarding food items, beverages, special promotions, etc.-Ensure that all product served is accounted for on the final bill prior to presentation;-Verify guest satisfaction with each table during each course served;-Provide service throughout the guests dining experience and anticipate guest needs;-Following the posted opening and closing duties and side work sheet;

summary: Live the Dolce Vita!! The Wine….The Food….The Bar….The Buzz….The Music…..The Details….The People…..makes Filini a truly contemporary Italian experience....
full_description: Live the Dolce Vita!!The Wine….The Food….The Bar….The Buzz….The Music…..The Details….The People…..makes Filini a truly contemporary Italian experience.Filini, a 150-seat contemporary Italian restaurant and bar set in the heart of downtown Chicago will fulfill the desire for a stylish ambience and an affordable and authentic Italian experience with an emphasis on quality ingredients and classic cooking techniques. It will offer Italian cuisine of a high order, blending together both Italian and local produce to create a greatly enjoyed and respected dining experience. The service, the design, and the mood give Filini a sense of style that compliments the exquisite and simple food. The role of the Cocktail Server is to serve beverages our guests in a timely, courteous, efficient and accurate manner.Additional responsibilities include:-Interacts with guests and team members in a polite, courteous and hospitable manner to ensure an exemplary experience.       -Accurately take orders, give suggestions, conducts full and complete food/wine/beverage service, and monitor our guests' experience. -Answer guest questions regarding food items, beverages, special promotions, etc.;-Serves extensive array of beverage and food;-Provide service throughout the guests dining experience;-Place all beverage orders through the bartender(s);- Observes and monitors guests at the bar to respond to any and all needs the guest may have; - Adheres to all responsible alcohol consumption requirements as dictated by the State of Illinois; -Help to maintain the cleanliness and integrity of the bar by completing all side duties and special projects as issued by management team;

Come work where tradition is rich and your hard work will be appreciated.

summary: SS A minimum of 2 years of experience is required SS Must be able to communicate clearly with managers, kitchen and dining room personnel....
full_description: Duties & Responsibilities: SS Prepares a variety of meats, seafood, poultry, vegetables and other food items using Mediterranean recipes for cooking in broilers, ovens, grills, fryers and a variety of other kitchen equipment. SS Assumes 100% responsibility for quality of products served. SS Knows and complies consistently with our standard portion sizes, cooking methods, quality standards and kitchen rules, policies and procedures. SS Stocks and maintains sufficient levels of food products at line stations to assure a smooth service period. SS Portions food products prior to cooking according to standard portion sizes and recipe specifications. SS Maintains a clean and sanitary work station area including tables, shelves, grills, broilers, fryers, pasta cookers, saute burners, convection oven, flat top range and refrigeration equipment. SS Prepares item for broiling, grilling, frying, sauteing or other cooking methods by portioning, battering, breading, seasoning and/or marinating. SS Follows proper plate presentation and garnish set up for all dishes. SS Handles, stores and rotates all products properly. SS Completes required tasks within assigned time frames. SS Tracks and reports any food waste. SS Assists in food prep assignments during off-peak periods as needed. SS Opens and/or closes the kitchen properly and follows the closing checklist for kitchen stations. Assists others in closing the kitchen. SS Cooks only items generated from the restaurant point-of-sale system SS Performs related duties such as helping to wash dishes as needed, preparing recycling, cleaning around restaurant and help with any other projects as assigned by the kitchen manager. SS If a meal is returned for any reason, correct the problem and report the return to the manager. SS Attends all scheduled employee meetings and brings suggestions for improvement. SS Performs other related duties as assigned by the manager-on-duty. Qualifications: SS A minimum of 2 years of experience is required SS Must be able to communicate clearly with managers, kitchen and dining room personnel. SS Be able to reach, bend, stoop and frequently lift up to 40 pounds. SS Be able to work in a standing position for long periods of time (up to 9 hours).
